com.ysc3237.snapcat

Class MainActivity

  • com.ysc3237.snapcat.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity

    Main activity that acts as a controller for our app's functionality. Loads our photos from the server on the feed, and provides photo-taking functionality together with interaction with our server.
